None.Name: Acid Breath
None.Description: Every 2 seconds, unit spits an acid cloud at enemies that deals 150 damage.

None.Name: Sleep well!
None.Description: Makes up to 3 enemy units fall asleep for 15 seconds. Affected units may neither move nor attack. After 3 seconds they will awake if being attacked. Reusable every 20 seconds.
